title: Spacious eight bedroom apartment CENTRAL A/C Available 9/1
posting_body: ['One of a kind multi level eight bedroom apartment in the heart of Allston.', 'The apartment features spacious open concept kitchen and living area with big windows and lots of natural light.', 'Kitchen is fully equipment with dishwasher, refrigerator stove and lots of cabinets.', 'Main floor also features half bathroom and and entrance to outside area.', 'Perfect for those nice weather days.', 'Off street parking for at least eight cars is nice bonus included in rent shared with other unit.', 'Every floor in the house offers a bathroom and spacious bedrooms with hardwood floors throughout the house.', 'Top floor rooms with skylight bringing the sunshine in.', 'In addition the apartment also has spacious basement with lots of storage and coin operated laundry.', 'This one of a kind property is located close to public transportation, Boston University, restaurants shops and all of the vibrant downtown Allston has to offer.', 'For more information please contact', 'Alessandro Santana', 'Charlesgate Realty']
